text: 58|18|allāh ivarkaḷ aṉaivaraiyum (uyir koṭuttu) eḻuppum nāḷilum (iṉṟaiya tiṉam) uṅkaḷiṭam avarkaḷ cattiyam ceytataip pōṉṟu, allāhviṭattilum cattiyam ceytuviṭṭu, niccayamākat tāṅkaḷ ētō (tappittuk koḷḷakkūṭiya oru nalla) kāriyattaic ceytu viṭṭatākavum eṇṇik koḷvārkaḷ. Meyyākavē ivarkaḷtāṉ poyyarkaḷaṉṟō
